statements: SELECT * FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE renewal_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT policy_holder FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE payment_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE policy_id = 12345 AND renewal_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY renewal_date DESC, payment_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE payment_amount > 1000 GROUP BY policy_holder_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT * FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE policy_holder_name IN ('Alice','Bob','Charlie') AND payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC, payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(payment_amount), AVG(payment_amount) FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals WHERE policy_id = 54321 AND renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) AS total_renewals FROM premium_payments_and_policy_renewals GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_renewals > 2 ORDER BY total_renewals DESC,policy_id
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT policy_id, amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_date, amount, policy_id FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, renewed_by FROM PolicyRenewals ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date, renewed_by FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewed_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments p JOIN PolicyRenewals r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id WHERE r.renewal_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount, MIN(amount) AS lowest_amount FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_status = 'Active';
SELECT policy_id, policy_end_date FROM policies ORDER BY policy_end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT p.payment_id, r.renewal_amount FROM payments p JOIN renewals r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_status FROM policies WHERE policy_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM premium_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT p.policyholder_id, pr.policy_id, pr.renewal_date, pr.renewal_amount FROM policy_renewals pr JOIN insurance_policies p ON pr.policy_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_amount > 2000;
SELECT policyholder_name, coverage_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE renewal_frequency = 'Annual' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM liability_insurance_policies;
SELECT company_name, address FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, email FROM policy_holders ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, address, phone_number FROM insurance_companies;
SELECT holder_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM policy_holders WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT renewal_id, policy_id, renewal_date, renewed_until FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, policy_id, amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
